Articles.Content: After actually getting my observatory into geosynchronous orbit, I can't for the life of me work out what the sticky note on the right says on the Cupola module! Any ideas?

If I remember correctly that's the one that says

"Left the emergency slide rule in the bottom right cabinet.

-B.K.

P.S. I ate all the snacks."
Thanks! Was bugging me for a ages
How come the textures are so poor even when the graphics are turned up to max yet the B9 cockpits are generally really high def.
